headline: Ahead of Winter Storm, PG&E Mobilizes Crews, Pre-positions Resources to Support Safe, Efficient Response
summary: A powerful winter storm is forecast to bring widespread rain, heavy mountain snow including low-elevation snow, as well as wind gusts beginning Monday, February 16, 2026. Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) is pre-positioning resources to support the safe and efficient response to weather-related damage to electric equipment and potential power outages. The company is currently developing resource and preparedness plans and will also be activating its Emergency Operations Center to support t

headline: PG&E (PCG) Valuation Check After 2025 Earnings Progress And Wildfire Risk Improvements
summary: PG&E (PCG) just released its 2025 results, reporting revenue of US$24.94b and net income of US$2.59b, along with modest EPS gains and operational updates related to wildfire risk and customer electric rates. See our latest analysis for PG&E. PG&E's earnings update appears to have given the share price some momentum, with a 1 day share price return of 2.69% and a 7 day share price return of 7.86%. The 1 year total shareholder return of 11.68% and 5 year total shareholder return of 51.05%...

headline: Itron’s California Grid Projects Tie Wildfire Analytics To Long Term Growth
summary: Itron partnered with Toumetis to deploy real time analytics aimed at wildfire mitigation and electric reliability in Southern California. The company expanded its collaboration with Pacific Gas and Electric Company to roll out Grid Edge Intelligence solutions for home electrification and grid resilience. Both initiatives rely on Itron’s distributed intelligence technology to support grid modernization, wildfire risk reduction, and outage management. Itron, traded as NasdaqGS:ITRI, is...

headline: Pacific Gas & Electric Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Pacific Gas & Electric (NYSE:PCG) reported full-year 2025 core earnings of $1.50 per share, which CEO Patti Poppe said landed at the midpoint of the company’s guidance range and represented 10% growth from 2024. headline: PG&E (PCG) Is Up 7.9% After 2025 Beat And 2026 Outlook Update Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: PG&E Corporation has reported its full-year 2025 results, with revenue rising to US$24,935 million and net income reaching US$2,593 million, alongside modestly higher earnings per share versus 2024. The company paired these results with a refined 2026 earnings outlook, lower residential electric rates, and continued wildfire mitigation and reliability improvements, underscoring how operational changes are feeding into its financial profile. We’ll now examine how PG&E’s updated 2026 earnings...

headline: Utilities Soar On Surging Power Demand From Data Centers
summary: The good times may not last as the dynamic between AI firms and utility companies draws bipartisan scrutiny.
